participant_1.background:
I remember summers spent playing in the creek with my friends.
My dream is to travel the world and take pictures of my journey.
I like to take my charges hiking in the Appalachian trail.
I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete.
My parents are not tech-savvy, but they are very supportive of my interests.

participant_2.background:
I miss the days of being a kid, but I'm trying to make the best of my current situation.
I love to cook and try new recipes, but I usually end up making campfire stew because it's my favorite.
I just got back from visiting my family
I have two loves: my family and travel.
I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job.

content.text: How has your day been?
It's been good! I just got back from visiting my family.
Oh, that's nice! I miss my family, I wish I could see them more often.
Me too, but I'm grateful for the time I get to spend with them.
I know what you mean. What's your favorite thing to do with them?
I love to cook with them, and we always have the best time.
That sounds really fun! I'm not very good at cooking, but I enjoy trying new recipes.
I'm sure you're better than you think! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make campfire stew, it's so easy and delicious.
That sounds really good! I'll have to try that sometime.
You should! It's so easy, and it's a great way to spend time with friends and family.
I will, thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel, and I'm always looking for new places to explore.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to travel the world.
You should! It's the best way to learn about different cultures and people.
I know, I really want to. I just need to find the time and money.
You'll find a way! It's worth it, I promise.
I know it is. I'm just waiting for the right time.
Well, I'm sure it will be soon
